content.html: I’m guilty of this myself. Don’t over share at work. It’s good to have a genuine relationship with your manager, but don’t get it twisted, they have a job to do. Opening up about your personal struggles may bite in unsuspected ways. Keep it strictly professional, at all times. twitter.com/i/web/status/1…
